Harley Davidson Specifications

Year: 2007, Model: Sportster XL1200C

Introduction

The 2007 Harley Davidson XL1200C Sportster 1200 Custom sports an air-cooled, 1200cc, Evolution V-twin engine mated to a six-speed manual transmission and can produce 107 Nm of torque at 4000 rpm.

Standard features include new tank decoration and cloisonn√©, a black, powder-coated finish to the engine and a chrome treatment, chrome, laced steel, 21" front wheels, a chrome, slotted-disc, cast-aluminium rear wheel, a wide, polished handlebar on pull-back risers, an one-piece, two-up classic seat, a chrome, staggered, shorty dual exhaust, forward-mounted foot controls, low-profile rear shocks, and a polished fuel tank console.

Engine Specs
Type Air-cooled, Evolution
Displacement 1202 cm3
Bore x Stroke 3.5 x 3.8 in OR 89 mm
Compression Ratio 10:01
Horsepower / KW(hp)/RPM
Torque 79/4000 lb-ft/RPM OR 107/4000 Nm/RPM
Fuel System Electronic Sequential Port Fuel Injection (ESPFI)

Chassis Specs
Frame Steel
Front Suspension Telescopic, Coil Spring, Oil Damped
Rear Suspension Dual Shocks
Front Brake Single 292mm Disc, 2-Piston Caliper
Rear Brake Single 260mm Disc, 1-Piston Caliper

Dimension Specs

Overall Width 33.1 in OR 841 mm
Seat Height 28.5 in OR 724 mm
